articles.title: Always Tired? A Mini-Stroke You Didn’t Notice Could Be Why - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Mini-strokes can leave lasting exhaustion, despite a quick outward recovery.
articles.content:
Mini-strokes may lead to long-term fatigue in over half of patients, highlighting a hidden burden beyond initial recovery.
Fatigue may linger for a year after a mini-stroke, especially in people wit… [+3996 chars]
